works.description:
The text:

"Who doesn’t want to make free calls from PC to mobile? Almost all of us want such a service. But, no call could be made free to anyone unless someone else bears the total cost of your free cheap calls without suffering his or her loss. In today’s world of advertisement this is possible. Hat’s off to the idea of those individuals who made this task possible."

has been added to all of the following pages at bottom. As one can see; the stolen part of my article is totally unrelated and it is actually being used by http://ucallweconn.net/ to buy links from all of these website. And he could not even manage writing his own content. Rather used my content, placed links to his website and submitted in totally un-related websites.
